title: [bug] in JavaScript api: I can't create `IconMenuItem` and `CheckMenuItem`

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

1. When I tried to create CheckMenuItem, the child node CheckMenuItem could not be displayed, but there was no error in devtools.
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/26cc12ff-8d32-46ae-a0f0-8d88adcad11f)

2. When I tried to create IconMenuItem, IconMenuItem couldn't accept my custom pictures and convert them into icons.
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0df2ca44-178a-417c-a145-ada806f17447)


### Reproduction

https://github.com/RSS1102/tauri-app/blob/main/src/App.vue#L8

### Expected behavior

_No response_
